subject: Golf
ADT Championship (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Lorena Ochoa won the ADT Championship on Sunday by hitting the best shot of her five-year pro career and the shot of the year on the L.P.G.A. Tour.
snippet: Lorena Ochoa won the ADT Championship on Sunday by hitting the best shot of her five-year pro career and the shot of the year on the L.P.G.A. Tour.
